Vanishing Act.name: Vanishing Act
Vanishing Act.flavor: You strike, and in the wink of an eye, are gone.
Vanishing Act.effect: You become invisible until the start of your next turn.

Guillaume's Veil.name: Guillaume's Veil
Guillaume's Veil.flavor: You make a series of mystical passes, and you and your companions fade from view.
Guillaume's Veil.target: You and each ally in the burst
Guillaume's Veil.effect: The target gains invisibility until the end of your next turn or until he or she hits or misses with an attack. The burst creates a zone of invisibility that lasts until the end of your next turn. Whenever you or an ally ends his or her turn within the zone, that individual becomes invisible until the end of his or her next turn or until he or she hits or misses with an attack.
Guillaume's Veil.sustainMinor: The zone persists. As a move action, you can move the zone 4 squares.

Vanishing Legion.name: Vanishing Legion
Vanishing Legion.flavor: You sweep your hands and lash your enemies with a devastating attack, then collect its residual energy to cloak your allies.
Vanishing Legion.effect: You and your allies within 10 squares become invisible to the target (save ends).
